Hello Everyone,

I have the following 5 Ungraded HOFers for sale

Baker Piedmont 350-460, Creased $80.00

Marquard Portrait Sovereign 350, No Creases, Tape on back. Very sharp looking card! $80.00

Willis Batting Piedmont 350, a crease at the bottom  $80.00

Eddie Collins Sweet Cap 350, a crease above the player's head and two wrinkles in the right border $80.00

Walter Johnson Portrait Sweet Cap 150, 2 scuff marks and a couple of wrinkles at the corners and the right border. Nice looking card! $300.00 SOLD

Add $3.00 shipping. Paypal, Money Order or Check.

First email that says they want them gets them.

Thanks,

Joe
Hi Joe PM sent some time ago on Johnson. Thanks

Johnson is sold. 4 others still available.

Joe
